languages.text: "Я правильно понимаю, что жизнь всего экипажа сейчас зависит от того, смогу ли я убедить дух корабля запустить сломанную деталь?"
"The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"
languages.original_text: "Я правильно понимаю, что жизнь всего экипажа сейчас зависит от того, смогу ли я убедить дух корабля запустить сломанную деталь?"

traits.locale_text: "The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"
"The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"
"The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"
"The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"

languages.text: “我必须说服飞船的机魂来启动一个坏了的零件。全体船员的性命都取决于我能不能做得到，是这样吧？”
languages.original_text: "The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"

traits.locale_text: “我必须说服飞船的机魂来启动一个坏了的零件。全体船员的性命都取决于我能不能做得到，是这样吧？”

languages.text: 「今、クルー全員の命が、私が船の精霊を説得し、壊れた部品を再起動させるかどうかにかかっている…というわけだな？」
languages.original_text: "The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"

traits.locale_text: 「今、クルー全員の命が、私が船の精霊を説得し、壊れた部品を再起動させるかどうかにかかっている…というわけだな？」
「今、クルー全員の命が、私が船の精霊を説得し、壊れた部品を再起動させるかどうかにかかっている…というわけだな？」

languages.text: "Das Leben der gesamten Crew hängt davon ab, dass ich den Geist des Schiffs davon überzeuge, eine defekte Komponente zu starten – ist das richtig?"
languages.original_text: "The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Leben der gesamten Crew hängt davon ab, dass ich den Geist des Schiffs davon überzeuge, eine defekte Komponente zu starten – ist das richtig?"

languages.text: « La vie de l'équipage tout entier repose sur ma capacité à convaincre l'esprit du vaisseau de redémarrer un dispositif endommagé... c'est bien ça ? »
languages.original_text: "The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"

traits.locale_text: « La vie de l'équipage tout entier repose sur ma capacité à convaincre l'esprit du vaisseau de redémarrer un dispositif endommagé... c'est bien ça ? »

languages.text: «Para asegurarme: ¿dice que las vidas de todos los miembros de la tripulación dependen de que convenza al espíritu de la nave para que active un componente roto?».
languages.original_text: "The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"

traits.locale_text: «Para asegurarme: ¿dice que las vidas de todos los miembros de la tripulación dependen de que convenza al espíritu de la nave para que active un componente roto?».

languages.text: "Tüm mürettebatın yaşamı, geminin ruhunu bozuk bir bileşeni çalıştırması için ikna etmeme bağlı. Doğru mu anlamışım?"
languages.original_text: "The lives of the entire crew now depend on my convincing the ship's spirit to start up a broken component — is that right?"

traits.locale_text: "Tüm mürettebatın yaşamı, geminin ruhunu bozuk bir bileşeni çalıştırması için ikna etmeme bağlı, doğru mu anlamışım?"
